title: [GAMEPLAY] Ezreal blinking away when hooked by Blitzcrank's Q
body:
{{champion:53}} {{champion:81}} 
When Blitz successfully hits Ezreal with his Q, Ezreal can just blink away and not be affected. You can even see the hook still attached to Ez while he blinks. I don't know if that's how it is supposed to be, but I don't think that's the case. To recreate the bug, have blitz shoot his Q at Ezreal and right as the ability hits, have Ez blink away (I don't know exactly how that works, I haven't played Ez ever).

replies.body: Not a bug. What ez did was use his blink right before blitz q hit and then his went off after blitz.

Hey Souvlaki Viking - 

This is actually working as intended! Similar things happen with Tristana's jump!
Connecting Death Sentence a mere moment after Trist tries to jump is a very good feeling.
Both Ezreal and Tristana have a small period before their blink/jump happens where they're immune to displacements.
